metadata.title: CVE-2023-2860 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was found in the SR-IPv6 implementationin the Linux kernel. The flaw exists within the processing of seg6attributes. The issue results from the improper validation of user-supplieddata, which can result in a read past the end of an allocated buffer. Thisflaw allows a privileged local user to disclose sensitive information onaffected installations of the Linux kernel.
